Generate fake data with privacy controls

Source: R/generate_fake_with_privacy.R, R/privacy.R
generate_fake_with_privacy.Rd

Thin wrapper over generate_fake_data() that forwards privacy options.

Usage

generate_fake_with_privacy(
  data,
  n = 30,
  level = c("low", "medium", "high"),
  seed = NULL
)

generate_fake_with_privacy(
  data,
  n = 30,
  level = c("low", "medium", "high"),
  seed = NULL
)

Arguments

data

data.frame

n

rows

level

'low' | 'medium' | 'high'

seed

optional seed

category_mode, numeric_mode, column_mode

Optional overrides passed to generate_fake_data().

sensitive

Character vector of original column names treated as sensitive.

sensitive_detect

Logical; detect common sensitive columns by name (id/email/phone).

sensitive_strategy

One of "fake" or "drop".

Value

A data.frame with attributes like name_map, dropped_columns, sensitive_columns.
